thread.title: U-Haul Offering 30 Days of Free Self-Storage and U-Box to Hurricane Joaquin Flood Victims in North and South Carolina
thread.title_full: U-Haul Offering 30 Days of Free Self-Storage and U-Box to Hurricane Joaquin Flood Victims in North and South Carolina - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: U-Haul Offering 30 Days of Free Self-Storage and U-Box to Hurricane Joaquin Flood Victims in North and South Carolina
text:
U-Haul
HICKORY, N.C. , Oct. 5, U-Haul Company of Western North Carolina is offering 30 days of free self-storage and U-Box container usage to people in northern South Carolina and western North Carolina affected by the historic flooding from Hurricane Joaquin.
Nine U-Haul storage facilities across Greenville and Spartanburg in South Carolina and Asheville , Boone , Hendersonville and Hickory in North Carolina will participate in 30 days of free self-storage assistance.
"This area wasn't affected all that bad, but people are often going to evacuate to where friends and family are located in this area," said Doug Weston , marketing company president for U-Haul Company of Western North Carolina . "People will gather whatever they can salvage, and I want to help when they get here. U-Haul is here for communities in times of crises and this is just one way we can show our support."
Families needing more information about 30 days of free self-storage assistance should contact the U-Haul store nearest you. The U-Haul storage facilities in these areas are listed here:
U-Haul Moving & Storage of West Greenville
1406 Grove Road
Greenville , SC 29605
(864) 269-8172
U-Haul Moving & Storage at Wade Hampton
529 Wade Hampton Blvd.
Greenville , SC 29609
(864) 233-8319
U-Haul Moving & Storage at Roper Mountain
24 Roper Mountain Road
Greenville , SC 29607
(864) 254-9154
U-Haul Moving & Storage of Spartanburg

Spartanburg , SC 29303
(864) 582-4140
U-Haul Moving & Storage of East Asheville

(828) 298-8551

(828) 297-1723
U-Haul Moving & Storage of Hendersonville

Hendersonville , NC 28792
(828) 233-5017
U-Haul Moving & Storage of Downtown Hickory
542 Main Ave. SE
Hickory , NC 28602
(828) 256-0209
U-Haul Moving & Storage of West Hickory
331 U.S. Hwy. 70 SW
Hickory , NC 28602
(828) 358-3669
U-Haul stores have much-needed supplies available to help with storm recovery, such as boxes, tarps, propane and propane tanks. U-Haul urges customers to stop in to ensure that their propane tanks are topped off, since propane is good to have on hand in the event of long-term power outages.
With U-Box portable moving and self-storage containers , you can conveniently pick up our custom-designed trailer and take your U-Box container with you. U-Haul also can store your U-Box container in our secure warehouses or even pick up and deliver it to a location of your choice.
In addition to the 30 days of free self-storage being offered, people who need boxes can take advantage of the U-Haul Take a Box, Leave a Box Program. The program enables customers to return their reusable boxes and allows others to take them as needed â€“ FREE. U-Haul encourages anyone who has any type of reusable box to drop it off at the nearest U-Haul location and allow another family to reuse the box.
About U-Haul
